title: Textile, late 1920s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave.  Screen printed (14 colors).  Height of repeat: 28".  Lengths would repeat as half-drops when sewn together.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 90 x 74 cm (35 7/16 x 29 1/8 in.)
description: Large magenta-pink flowers on a brown tree with a white/pink bird.
